Name: Loplight
About the game: You are Edda, a young girl lost in a dying world. The elements of the world have been unleashed, ancient demons stalk the lands. Collect the pieces of Quintessence, ascend to a divine power, defeat the elder god harvesting the souls of the world. Short but replayable story High intensity combat, Dodge, Slash, and Shoot your way to victory! Story Rich experience, explore the morality behind ambition and loneliness
